required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Vyndaqel Drug Use Investigation (Regulatory Post Marketing Commitment Plan)
clinical_study.official_title: VYNDAQEL DRUG USE INVESTIGATION (REGULATORY POST MARKETING COMMITMENT PLAN)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to understand safety (e.g., occurrence of adverse drug reactions [ADRs]) and efficacy data on the long-term use of Vyndaqel Capsules (hereinafter referred to as Vyndaqel) in all patients who received this drug under actual use conditions after its marketing.

detailed_description.textblock: Both prospective and retrospective is acceptable All the patients whom an investigator prescribes Vyndaqel should be registered

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence of adverse drug reaction in this study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline on the following scale; NIS, QOL-DN, mBMI

study_pop.textblock: The subjects of this surveillance are all patients who received Vyndaqel.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
The subjects of this surveillance are all patients who received Vyndaqel.
Exclusion Criteria:
Patients not receive Vyndaqel.

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
